title: OSForensics Professional 3.3.1001 + Serial.zip
description:
OSForensics enables you to definitely identify suspicious files and activity with hash matching, drive signature evaluations, e-mails, memory and binary data.

It allows you extract forensic evidence from computer systems rapidly with advanced file searching and indexing and allows this data to become handled effectively.

Features

Uncover Forensic Evidence Faster

Find files faster, search by filename, size and time

Search within file contents while using Zoom internet search engine

Sort through email archives from Outlook, ThunderBird, Mozilla and much more

Recover and check erased files

Uncover recent activity of website vists, downloads and logins

Collect detailed system information

Password recovery from browsers, understanding of office documents

Uncover and reveal hidden areas inside your hard disk drive

Browse Volume Shadow copies to determine past versions of files

Identify Suspicious Files and Activity

Verify and match files with MD5, SHA-1 and SHA-256 hashes

Find misnamed files in which the contents don't match their extension

Create and compare drive signatures to recognize variations

Timeline viewer supplies a visual representation of system activity with time

File viewer that may display streams, hex, text, images and meta data

Email viewer that may display messages from the archive

Registry viewer to permit quick access to Home windows registry hive files

File system browser for explorer-like navigation of supported file systems on physical drives, volumes and pictures

Raw disk viewer to navigate and check with the raw disk bytes on physical drives, volumes and pictures

Internet browser to browse and capture online content for offline evidence management

ThumbCache viewer to see the Home windows thumbnail cache database for proof of images/files that could have once experienced the machine

SQLite database browser to see the and evaluate the items in SQLite database files

ESEDB viewer to see and evaluate the items in Ose DB (.edb) database files, a typical storage format utilized by various Microsoft programs

Prefetch viewer to recognize time and frequency of programs that been runnning around the system, and therefore recorded through the O/S's Prefetcher

Manage Your Digital Analysis

Situation management allows you to definitely aggregate and organize results and situation products

HTML situation reviews provide a listing of all results and products you've connected having a situation

Centralized control over storage products for convenient access across all OSForensics' functionality

Drive imaging for creating/rebuilding a precise copy of the hard drive

Rebuild RAID arrays from individual disk images

Install OSForensics on the USB memory stick for additional portability

Conserve a secure log from the exact activities transported out throughout the analysis

Professional and Bootable Models

The professional and bootable models of OSForensics have numerous features unavailable within the free edition, including

Import and export of hash sets

Easy to customize system information gathering

No limts on the quantity of cases being handled through OSForensics

Restoration of multiple erased files in a single operation

List and check for alternate file streams

Sort image files by colour

Disk indexing and looking out not limited to a set quantity of files

No watermark on web captures

Multi-core acceleration for file understanding

Easy to customize System Information Gathering

View NTFS directory $I30 records to recognize potential hidden/erased files

The bootable edition consists of all of the professional features plus the opportunity to be operate on systems with no valid operating-system
